items.sentence: I had a very stimulating conversation with Tom.
I had many friends when I was living in Boston.
Tom and his teacher were talking to each other.
Tom asked Mary not to wake him up before seven.
Tom asked Mary to show him some of her artwork.
Do you think it\'ll be easy for Tom to do that?
I bought this camera for three hundred dollars.
Tom admitted that he hadn\'t read Mary\'s book.
Why are you still standing outside in the rain?
I thought about telling Tom, and I should have.
